channel.description: Software engineering PhD student at Carnegie Mellon University

item.title: Welcome to My Crib!
item.description:
Hi there! Welcome to my personal website. Here, I will be recording the my passion, love, and happiness throughout my lifetime. This may include some precious moments journeys traveling around the world, the people I share these moments with, and my goofy hobbiesâ€¦

Life is short, and itâ€™s crucial that I always live in the present and look towards the future insteading of dwell on the past. I hope by concretizing the past moments, I can achieve this, and truly live each day to the fullest, and as if it was my last. And I hope you can do it too!

I hope you will enjoy reading this! If you have any feedback, please submit a pull request on GitHub, where I am hosting this site.

Bon Voyage! ðŸŒŽ
